extendedInfo.description: GO Keyboard is the best and the most popular keyboard on the android marketï¼ Dictionary to be used only with "GO Keyboard" app.Don't try to open it after installation, you just need to change the language in GO Keyboard to use this dictionary.ï¼GO Keyboard settings -> Input settings -> Input language settingsï¼Language:Portugueseï¼PTï¼

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Extreme lack of words.  Many words always start with capital letter. Priority to number instead of the words and a few other \"bug s \". Go keyboard for English Seems great so far but for Portuguese is a waste of time.
reviews.author: Bruno R.

reviews.title: Worth to try
reviews.comment: Great design, simple, awesome features. Its the best keyboard app.
reviews.author: Gisela Hasparyk Miranda

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: GOOD but not user friendly. Make it simpler.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix this words(Portuguese):
reviews.comment: Com, Voc\303\252, Eu, Rede, As,HOJE ,Vai,Tu,Ele,Ela,N\303\263s,Eles,Elas,Olha .They all r suposed to be lower case unless in the beginning! Then I ll give 5 stars:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Below average
reviews.comment: Very incomplete, word capitalization in lots of words. However, the fact that the agreement is not updated is a plus for me. When you add the new agreement, please leave the option to use the old one, otherwise i will uninstall it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incomplete is a compliment
reviews.comment: I had uninstalled and thought I\'d give it another try but instead it seems it got worse!! Where do you get your Portuguese words from? Why do you assume every word needs to be capitalised? Adaptx is a million times better and I\'m afraid you guys are not having a third chance...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the first letter caps
reviews.comment: Almost impossible to write 2 words without having to fix one. Many wrong words and a lot of words with  first letter uppercase. Love GO work on everything else, but this one misses quality by far. By the way...  Portuguese from Portugal and Brazil are completely different.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has to be improved
reviews.comment: It\'s good but lacks some basic words and capitalize automatically others, like Voc\303\252 and Novo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yuk
reviews.comment: Capitalisation is all wrong, very basic and incomplete.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aweful
reviews.comment: This keyboard is terrible.  The dictionary was makes typing nearly impossible( both in English and portuguese).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lack of words including verbs or conjugations of verbs, capitalized words where it shouldn\'t be, and new words added to the dictionary not available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad dictionary
reviews.comment: Great keyboard but the Portuguese dictionary is very bad :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eu adorei o aplicativo go keboard
reviews.comment: Tem muita coisa legal no aplicativo go keboard
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: FTW Excellent in every aspect. Flawless, beautiful, customize everything!
